title: Filthy Rich Cadets
description: He was my mine… before he became my enemy.Cole Marshall was my best friend.He was my first kiss.My first love.And then he pushed me away…Now, I’m the new girl at York Military Academy.The scholarship student everyone hates.I came to this school to find answers.But the cadets will do anything to get rid of me.Even bet on who can break me first.Cole and his friends think they bully me into leaving the school. But I can handle my own, and I’m not backing down to a challenge.Filthy Rich Cadets is the first book in a completed friends to enemies to lovers duet. It is a spin-off from the Princes of Devil's Creek series, but it is not necessary to read that series first.
author: Jillian Frost
